data.actual_result: The suggestion won't show up, until you press Space again. Then if you pick a suggestion, the first `:` or `@` symbol will be duplicated.
data.expected_result: Suggestions should show up and writes it between the two spaces when you select one
data.short_description: Emoji/Username suggestions won't show up when you're typing in the middle of your message
data.steps_to_repro: - 1) Go to any channel where you can type in - 2) In the text area, write two words separated by 2 spaces - 3) Place your cursor between the two spaces, and write either a `:` to insert an emoji or `@` to mention someone
